mapper.select: select prid, pid, prwriter, prcontent, pregDate from picture_reply where pid = #{pid} ORDER BY PREGDATE
SELECT rprid, parentPrid, pid, rprwriter, rprcontent, rpregDate FROM picture_reply2 WHERE pid = #{pid} AND parentPrid = #{parentPrid} ORDER BY RPREGDATE
mapper.insert: insert into picture_reply(prid, pid, prwriter, prcontent, pregDate) values(picture_reply_seq.NEXTVAL, #{pid}, #{prwriter}, #{prcontent}, SYSDATE)
